name: HelpMeSleepThe15MinuteInsomniaCure
0:
”Alexa, help me sleep”
”Alexa, open help me sleep”
”Alexa, launch help me sleep”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: help me sleep
des:
UPDATED VERSION: Remastered, new audio track! 

Need to be asleep in 15 minutes? Lie down and let a calm, soothing voice walk you into sleep using the proven Progressive Muscle Relaxation method, with soft backing music, designed to quiet both body and mind. Most people don't make it all the way through this fifteen minute recording before they're fast asleep. Once you've learned and practiced the method you can use it anywhere at any time, even when Alexa's not available. 

WHAT DOES THE EXERCISE SOUND LIKE? Listen to a sample of the track here: https://lovemyecho.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/HelpMeSleepSample.mp3

Note: This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
